events.description: Initial Leak (June 29, 2023): Media reports surfaced that IARC was preparing to classify aspartame as "possibly carcinogenic." Official Ruling (July 14, 2023): WHO released findings—IARC classified aspartame as Group 2B while JECFA reaffirmed the ADI of 0–40 mg/kg as safe.

events.event_name: Diet Coke vs Coke Zero Content (India)
